name: 90 Days To Defence
description:
At your disposal is a whole tower, which is being rebuilt as the treasury is replenished with gold. But how to get it? Very simple - destroy those who besiege your tower, build defensive weapons, set traps, save gold and most importantly, last 90 days!

90 days to Defense - Tower Defense game, to protect the tower, the player acts as the manager, who must protect the kingdom's treasury from hordes of barbarians, giant strong men, catapults and even ravens flying by. You can furnish your tower with various weapons and traps, everything to last 90 days and save a fortune for your king!



Game Features:
- High difficulty
- Castle Defense
- Purchase improvements
- Set traps
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive management
